a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Average usual weekly hours worked, women 15 years and older, 1983 to 2016
Average usual weekly hours worked on the main job, for women ages 15+. Estimates correspond to total declared
employment. This includes part-time and full-time employment, as well as self-employment and dependent
Data source: OECD Labor Force Statistics (2017)
